data.name: Sample - Anomali ThreatStream - 2.3.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Anomali ThreatStream" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Anomali ThreatStream > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetch Incidents from Anomali ThreatStream

resource.name: {{vars.item["name"]}}
resource.source: Anomali ThreatStream Incident: {%if vars.item["circles"] | length > 0 %} {{vars.item["circles"][0]["name"]}} {%else %} Anomali ThreatStream {%endif %}

arguments.alerts_status_map: {'New, Open, Incident Reported': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Open') }}, 'Containment Achieved, Restoration Achieved': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Investigating') }}, 'Stalled': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Pending') }}, 'Closed, Rejected, Deleted': {{'AlertStatus'| picklist('Closed') }}}

routes.name: Create Record -> Update Last Incident Fetch Macro

workflows.name: > Anomali ThreatStream > Fetch
workflows.description: Fetch Incidents from Anomali ThreatStream

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
        {
          "title": "Search Query",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "text",
          "name": "search_query",
          "value": "",
          "placeholder": "created_ts__gte=2019-01-28T21:04:14",
          "description": "Valid search query to filter out the incidents "
        },
        {
          "title": "Number of Incidents to Fetch",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "integer",
          "name": "number_of_incidents_to_fetch",
          "value": 0,
          "tooltip": "Specifying 0 will return up to a maximum of 1000 results (if available). Max limit is 1000",
          "description": "Maximum number of results that this operation should return."
        },
        {
          "title": "Fetch Incidents in Last X min",
          "required": true,
          "editable": true,
          "visible": true,
          "type": "integer",
          "name": "fetch_incidents_in_last_X_minutes",
          "value": 10
        }
      ]

routes.name: Set Time Configuration -> Fetch Anomali Incidents

workflows.name: >> Anomali ThreatStream > Handle Macros
workflows.description: This playbook create Anomali ThreatStream macros if not exist.

routes.name: Check Anomali ThreatStream Macro -> Create Anomali ThreatStream Macro
routes.label: Create Macro

routes.name: Check Anomali ThreatStream Macro -> No Operation
routes.label: Macro Exists

routes.name: Get Macro Status -> Check Anomali ThreatStream Macro

workflows.name: Get Sandbox Status of Submitted URL/File
workflows.description: Retrieves the sandbox status of files or URLs that you have submitted to ThreatStream based on the report ID that you have specified.

steps.name: Get Sandbox Status of Submitted URL/File

arguments.name: Anomali ThreatStream
arguments.operationTitle: Get Sandbox Status of Submitted URL/File

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Sandbox Status of Submitted URL/File

routes.name: Start-> Get Sandbox Status of Submitted URL/File

arguments.verdict: {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= 65 %}{{"Malicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= 25 and vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence < 65 %}{{"Suspicious"}}{% elif vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence < 25 and vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].confidence >= 0 %}{{"Good"}}{% else %}{{"No Reputation Available"}}{% endif %}
arguments.field_mapping: {"ip_address": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].ip %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].ip}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "created_ts": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].created_ts %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].created_ts}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "modified_ts": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].modified_ts %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].modified_ts}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "expiration_ts": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].expiration_ts %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].expiration_ts}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "asn": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].asn %}{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].asn}}{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "organization": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].org %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].org}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "tlp": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].tlp %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].tlp}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "status": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].status %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].status}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}, "country": {% if vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].country %}"{{vars.steps.Get_Email_Reputation.data.objects[0].country}}"{% else %}{{None}}{% endif %}}

routes.name: Get URL Reputation -> Compute Anomali ThreatStream Summary

workflows.name: Get Threat Bulletin List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all threat bulletins or specific threat bulletins based on the search query and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Threat Bulletin List

workflows.name: Get Threat Bulletin Observables
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all observables associated with a specific threat bulletin based on the threat bulletin ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Threat Bulletin Observables

workflows.name: Submit Observables
workflows.description: Imports threat data (indicators) into ThreatStream and requires the approval of the imported data through the ThreatStream UI.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Submit Observables

workflows.name: Approved IOC By Import ID
workflows.description: Approve the Import Job, based on its ID

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Approved IOC By Import ID

routes.name: Start-> Approved IOC By Import ID

workflows.name: Get Intelligence Enrichments
workflows.description: Retrieves the enrichment data for the given observable.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Intelligence Enrichments

workflows.name: Create Incident
workflows.description: Creates an incident in ThreatStream based on the name, tags, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Create Incident

workflows.name: Get Incident
workflows.description: Collects and retrieves generated incidents from ThreatStream based on the incident ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Incident

workflows.name: Get Import Job Status
workflows.description: Retrieves the status of a submitted observable from ThreatStream based on the import ID that was returned in the response of the Submit Observables operation.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Import Job Status

workflows.name: Reject IOC By Import ID
workflows.description: function to reject an import job, after it has been verified as 'ready to review'

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Reject IOC By Import ID

routes.name: Start-> Reject IOC By Import ID

workflows.name: Get Incident List
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all incidents based on the search query and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Incident List

workflows.name: Delete Incident
workflows.description: Deletes an incident from ThreatStream based on the incident ID that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Delete Incident

workflows.name: Create Threat Bulletin
workflows.description: Creates a threat bulletin in ThreatStream based on the name, tags, and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Create Threat Bulletin

workflows.name: Get File Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified FileHash based on the filter criteria such as the filehash and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get File Reputation

workflows.name: Get URL Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified URL based on the filter criteria such as the URL and other input parameters that you have specified

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get URL Reputation

workflows.name: Get Whois Domain Information
workflows.description: Executes a WhoIs lookup on the specified domain name and retrieves a list of domains based on the domain name that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Whois Domain Information

workflows.name: Submit URLs or Files to Sandbox
workflows.description: Submit files or URLs to a specific ThreatStream-hosted sandbox based on the sandbox name, URLs/files, tags and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Submit URLs or Files to Sandbox

steps.name: Submit URLs or Files to Sandbox

arguments.name: Anomali ThreatStream
arguments.operationTitle: Submit URLs or Files to Sandbox

routes.name: Start-> Submit URLs or Files to Sandbox

workflows.name: Get IP Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified IP address based on the filter criteria such as the IP address and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get IP Reputation

workflows.name: Update Incident
workflows.description: Updates an incident in ThreatStream based on the incident ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Update Incident

workflows.name: Get Sandbox Report of Submitted URL/File
workflows.description: Retrieves the sandbox analysis report of files or URLs that you have submitted to ThreatStream based on the report ID that you have specified.

workflows.name: Get Domain Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified domain based on the filter criteria such as the domain name and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Domain Reputation

workflows.name: Get Email ID Reputation
workflows.description: Retrieves the reputation of the specified Email address based on the filter criteria such as the email address and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Email ID Reputation

workflows.name: Run Filter Language Query
workflows.description: Runs a search query using ThreatStream’s Filter Language Query grammar.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Run Filter Language Query

workflows.name: Get Import Job Details
workflows.description: Retrieves the details of import jobs from ThreatStream based on search query that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Import Job Details

workflows.name: Get Whois IP Information
workflows.description: Executes a WhoIs lookup on the specified IP address and retrieves a list of IP addresses based on the IP address that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Whois IP Information

workflows.name: Update Threat Bulletin
workflows.description: Updates a threat bulletin in ThreatStream based on the incident ID and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Update Threat Bulletin

workflows.name: Run Advanced Search
workflows.description: Runs an advanced search query using ThreatStream’s Query grammar.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Run Advanced Search

workflows.name: Get Incident List By Indicator
workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all incidents based on the intelligence value and other input parameters that you have specified.

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Incident List By Indicator

routes.name: Start-> Get Incident List By Indicator

workflows.name: Get Threat Bulletin Entities

arguments.title: Anomali ThreatStream: Get Threat Bulletin Entities
